``` ### Interests ::: macwindow - AI in Educational Measurement and Psychometrics - Psychometric network and Latent variable modeling - Machine Learning and data mining in Education - Diagnostic Classification Models ::: ### News ::: macwindow - 2025-03-30: New journal paper accepted by [Behavioral Sciences]{.underline}: *Comparing Frequentist and Bayesian Methods for Factorial Invariance with Latent Distribution Heterogeneity*, Authors: Xinya Liang \*, Ji Li, Mauricio Garnier-Villarreal, Jihong Zhang - 2025-03-27: New journal paper published (online first) by [Learning and Individual Differences]{.underline}:*Math anxiety is associated with skipping problems and less help-seeking behavior after error commission*, - 2025-02-28: I have been elected to serve as Secretary/Treasurer (3-year term begins in 2025) of the Cognition and Assessment SIG (SIG #167) of the American Educational Research Association (AERA).
